snippet: If online buzz and “Buy Now” buttons were translating into units sold, electric motorcycles would be a major growth industry. In reality, the number of buyers is barely detectable.
abstract: Handlebars column review of electric motorcycle makers that are discovering making a salable and profitable electric bike is harder than it looks.
lead_paragraph: If online buzz and “Buy Now” buttons were translating into units sold, electric motorcycles would be a major growth industry. In reality, the number of buyers is barely detectable.

headline.seo: Electric Motorcycle Sales Are Low, Despite Hype
headline.main: Electric Motorcycles in Search of a Market
headline.print_headline: Electric Motorcycles In Search of a Market
